titles.title: Health Care Access Improvement Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to primary health providers who establish practices in health professional shortage areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/10/2001--Introduced. Health Care Access Improvement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited tax credit to qualified primary health services providers who establish practices in health professional shortage areas.
